<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You're targeted by an attack made by an attacker you can see.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You're [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) against the triggering attack and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it. After the triggering attack is complete, you can Step if the triggering attack hit or Step twice if the triggering attack missed.
